sql.name: GET_B_U_POSSESSBOOK_SQL
sql.query: SELECT POS.idNum as idNum ,POS.user_idNum as uidNum ,POS.purchase_Date as pdate ,POS.purchase_Price as price ,POS.begin_Read as bread ,POS.end_Read as eread ,POS.quality as quality ,POS.state as state ,B.idNum as bidnum ,B.name as bname ,B.isbn10 as isbn10 ,B.isbn13 as isbn13 ,B.publish_comp as bcomp ,B.publish_date as bdate ,B.price as bprice ,B.cover as bcover ,B.category as category ,A.name as author FROM POSSESSBOOK POS, USER U, BOOK B, AUTHOR A WHERE U.isdelete = 0 AND POS.book_idNum=B.idNum AND B.idNum=A.book_idNum AND A.author_div = 0 AND U.idNum = POS.user_idNum AND POS.user_idNum = ? AND POS.book_idNum = ?

AND U.isdelete = 0 AND POS.book_idNum=B.idNum AND B.idNum=A.book_idNum AND A.author_div = 0 AND U.idNum = POS.user_idNum ORDER BY POS.idNum DESC LIMIT ?, ?

sql.name: GET_LIST_ZONEBOOK_SQL
sql.query: SELECT POS.idNum as idNum , POS.state as state , B.idNum as bidNum , B.cover as bcover , B.name as bname , U.idNum as uidNum , U.name as uname , U.user_id as uid , concat(ZC.sido,' ',ZC.gugun,' ',ZC.dong) as zonename FROM POSSESSBOOK POS, USER U, BOOK B,ZIPCODE ZC, (SELECT distinct Z.user_idNum, Z.zone FROM ZONE Z WHERE zone in ( SELECT Z3.zone FROM ZONE Z3, USER U3,ZIPCODE ZC WHERE U3.user_id = ? AND U3.idNum = Z3.user_idNum ) ) ZU WHERE POS.book_idNum=B.idNum AND POS.user_idNum=ZU.user_idNum AND U.idNUm= POS.user_idNum AND ZC.idNum=ZU.zone AND U.user_id <> ? ORDER BY POS.idNum DESC LIMIT ?, ?

sql.name: GET_DBCOUNT_ZONEBOOK_SQL
sql.query: SELECT COUNT(POS.idNum) FROM POSSESSBOOK POS, USER U, BOOK B,ZIPCODE ZC, (SELECT distinct Z.user_idNum, Z.zone FROM ZONE Z WHERE zone in ( SELECT Z3.zone FROM ZONE Z3, USER U3,ZIPCODE ZC WHERE U3.user_id = ? AND U3.idNum = Z3.user_idNum ) ) ZU WHERE POS.book_idNum=B.idNum AND POS.user_idNum=ZU.user_idNum AND U.idNUm= POS.user_idNum AND ZC.idNum=ZU.zone AND U.user_id <> ?

sql.name: LIST_SEARCH_POSSESSBOOK_SQL
sql.query: SELECT POS.idNum as idNum , POS.purchase_Date as pdate , POS.purchase_Price as price , POS.begin_read as bread , POS.end_read as eread , POS.quality as quality , POS.state as state , L.user_idNum as uidnum , B.idNum as bidnum , B.name as bname , B.isbn10 as isbn10 , B.isbn13 as isbn13 , B.publish_comp as bcomp , B.publish_date as bdate , B.price as bprice , B.cover as bcover , B.category as category , A.name as author FROM POSSESSBOOK POS ,( SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE name LIKE ? ) B ,LIBRARY L, AUTHOR A WHERE POS.book_idNum=B.idNum AND POS.user_idNum = L.user_idNum AND L.idNum = ? AND B.idNum = A.book_idNum AND A.author_div = 0 ORDER BY POS.idNum DESC LIMIT ?, ?
